I was wondering if anyone was getting OutOfMemoryErrors thrown when
checkpo=
inting.  On my system (8GB memory, 1GB allocated to the heap) I
have checkp=
ointing running every twenty four hours and it crashed
after only a few day=
s.  The checkpointing as far as I know is only
rolling over the logs, not w=
riting the (jdb?) files.  If anyone has
any ideas that might help, or if yo=
u need more information to help me
please let me know, thanks!
Mik
